author: senh
title: Banksy's 'Bemusement Park' Might Soon House Refugees
text: BING NEWS: Banksy's 'Dismaland' theme park brings $30M boost to U.K. town An anarchic amusement park by street artist Banksy that mocked capitalism and consumer culture has brought an economic boom to a faded seaside town. Banksy's Dismaland "bemusement park" transformed a derelict outdoor swimming pool in Weston-Super-Mare into ... 09/26/2015 - 2:33 am | View Link Explorium learners create cardboard rival to Banksy's Dismaland Following the opening of the graffiti artist's "bemusement park" in Weston-super-Mare, learners at Explorium have built their own version on its centre's first Cardboard Challenge Day, using materials provided by Living Homes in Street. A group of 16 ... 09/16/2015 - 10:05 pm | View Link Banksy's Dismaland closed because of high winds The latest Banksy exhibition has been closed because of high winds. Dismaland, which opened at Weston-super-Mare, as a 'Bemusement Park'was closed on Monday afternoon, September 14. North Somerset Council has said the exhibition should re-open later in the ... 09/14/2015 - 6:37 am | View Link Edinboro art professor featured in Banksy's Dismaland turned an atomic mushroom cloud into a child's tree house -- and, in the process, caught the attention of an internationally renowned street artist. Two sculptures by Wegner, 37, are featured in Banksy's Dismaland Bemusement Park, a dystopian theme park ... 09/6/2015 - 1:01 am | View Link Run the Jewels take the stage at Banksy’s Dismaland — watch The provocative and mysterious artist known as Banksy recently launched his very own “bemusement park,” a spoofing on Disneyland which he’s dubbed, Dismaland. Attractions include Water Cannon Creek, Guerilla Island, Grim Reaper-themed bumper cars ...
